prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with bright yellow feathers and striking blue accents.
I want a dinosaur-inspired Pokemon that can soar through the skies with elegance.
Generate an ancient bird Pokemon that embodies speed and agility in its design.
Make a colorful, winged creature that has a majestic presence and fierce determination.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines vibrant colors and sharp features to assert dominance.
Show me a prehistoric Pokemon with a blend of yellow and blue, known for its swiftness.
Design a Pokemon with a unique beak and a fiery spirit, ready for any battle.
